comments.name: onchain_macro
comments.text: FIDD 的赎回细节如果持续透明，机构侧采用会更快。
comments.zh: FIDD 的赎回细节如果持续透明，机构侧采用会更快。

comments.name: stablecoinwatch
comments.text: USDC.e 向原生 USDC 迁移这点很关键，能少一层桥接风险。
comments.zh: USDC.e 向原生 USDC 迁移这点很关键，能少一层桥接风险。

comments.name: liquiditydesk
comments.text: 这串信息组合起来更像‘基础设施升级’而不只是新闻汇总。
comments.zh: 这串信息组合起来更像‘基础设施升级’而不只是新闻汇总。

posts.fullText:
Stables weekly recap thread:

1) Fidelity's FIDD launch/redemption design is now clearer, with tighter primary-market mechanics than earlier drafts.
2) Tether published a fresh investment update, including treasury allocation and risk controls.
3) Polymarket is migrating from USDC.e to native USDC for cleaner settlement and lower bridge-dependency.

Net: market structure is maturing through better redemption rails, deeper transparency, and standardization on native liquidity.
posts.fullZh:
稳定币周报完整线程：

1）Fidelity 的 FIDD 发行/赎回机制披露更完整，一级市场闭环比早期方案更清晰。
2）Tether 更新了最新投资与储备配置信息，并补充风险控制框架。
3）Polymarket 正从 USDC.e 迁移到原生 USDC，以降低桥接依赖并简化结算路径。

整体结论：稳定币基础设施正在沿着“赎回可执行性更强、信息透明度更高、流动性标准更统一”的方向演进。

posts.name: Range
posts.text: USDC over Circle CCTP is becoming a default cross-chain settlement layer; Range launched explorer/intel API for transfer visibility.
posts.zh: 观点：USDC+Circle CCTP正成为跨链结算默认层；Range推出可观测工具提升资金流追踪能力。

comments.name: crosschain_pm
comments.text: CCTP 做默认结算层后，清算路径确实更可控。
comments.zh: CCTP 做默认结算层后，清算路径确实更可控。

comments.name: treasury_ops
comments.text: 如果能看到时延和落点分布，资金调度会更稳。
comments.zh: 如果能看到时延和落点分布，资金调度会更稳。

posts.fullText:
USDC over Circle CCTP is becoming a default cross-chain settlement layer.

We're seeing faster routing decisions from teams that prioritize canonical USDC over wrapped liquidity. To support this, Range launched explorer + intel APIs so desks can monitor transfer paths, latency, and destination concentration in real time.

When visibility improves, treasury operations become less reactive and more systematic.
posts.fullZh:
完整观点：USDC 叠加 Circle CCTP 正逐步成为跨链结算默认层。

越来越多团队在路由时优先选择“官方原生 USDC”而非封装流动性。为此，Range 发布了 explorer 与 intel API，可实时观察转账路径、到账时延与目的地集中度。

可观测性提升后，资金管理会从被动响应转向系统化调度。

posts.name: Stock Market Nerd
posts.text: Detailed $HOOD & $SHOP earnings reviews: key points, demand, profits, balance sheet, guide & valuation, plus management call takeaways.
posts.zh: 深度复盘 $HOOD 财报：覆盖需求、利润、资产负债表、指引与估值，并给出管理层电话会解读。

comments.name: growthvalue_cn
comments.text: 这份拆解比只看 headline 有用，尤其是利润率与留存联动。
comments.zh: 这份拆解比只看 headline 有用，尤其是利润率与留存联动。

posts.fullText:
Detailed $HOOD earnings review thread:

- Revenue mix improved with options + interest income staying resilient.
- Cost discipline helped margins surprise to the upside.
- Balance sheet remains flexible for product expansion.
- Guidance implies management sees durable engagement, not just event-driven spikes.

Call takeaways: product velocity and distribution remain the core edge; watch retention quality and incremental monetization per active user.
posts.fullZh:
$HOOD 财报深度版：

- 收入结构改善，期权与利息收入维持韧性；
- 费用控制有效，利润率超市场预期；
- 资产负债表灵活，为后续产品扩张留出空间；
- 公司指引反映管理层判断用户活跃具备持续性，不只是事件驱动脉冲。

电话会要点：产品迭代速度与分发能力仍是核心优势；后续重点跟踪留存质量与单活跃用户增量变现。

posts.name: TrendSpider
posts.text: Capitulation found. $HOOD
posts.zh: 量化信号：$HOOD 出现“恐慌出清（capitulation）”特征，通常对应短线极端情绪区。

comments.name: priceactionlab
comments.text: 需要成交量确认，否则容易变成弱反抽。
comments.zh: 需要成交量确认，否则容易变成弱反抽。

comments.name: swingtrader_hk
comments.text: capitulation 信号出现后，风控位比抄底点更重要。
comments.zh: capitulation 信号出现后，风控位比抄底点更重要。

posts.fullText:
Capitulation found on $HOOD.

Price action shows accelerated downside exhaustion with sentiment stretched to pessimistic extremes. Historically this setup can precede sharp mean-reversion bounces when volume confirms.

Not financial advice; manage risk and wait for confirmation.
posts.fullZh:
$HOOD 出现“恐慌出清（Capitulation）”信号。

价格行为显示下跌动能在末端加速后衰竭，情绪指标进入极端悲观区。历史上这类结构若配合放量确认，常见快速均值回归反弹。

仅作市场观察，不构成投资建议，需结合仓位与风控。

comments.text: 2x 已经不低了，回撤管理会决定这笔交易成败。
comments.zh: 2x 已经不低了，回撤管理会决定这笔交易成败。

posts.fullText:
Someone created a new wallet 11 hours ago and deposited 2M $USDC into Hyperliquid to go long $NVDA with 2x leverage.

The position is 21,687 xyz:NVDA (~$3.97M).

Address is fresh, size is meaningful, and timing suggests a high-conviction directional bet tied to AI large-cap momentum.
posts.fullZh:
链上追踪完整信息：一个 11 小时前新建的钱包向 Hyperliquid 存入 200 万 USDC，并以 2 倍杠杆做多 NVDA。

当前仓位为 21,687 单位 xyz:NVDA（约 397 万美元）。

该地址较新、下单规模较大、入场时点明确，呈现出对 AI 核心资产的高确信度方向性押注。

posts.name: LM Trading
posts.text: $HOOD Zooming out on a stock chart removes the noise and shows the bigger picture more clearly. Patience.
posts.zh: $HOOD：拉长周期看图能过滤噪音，更清楚看到大趋势。核心是耐心。

comments.name: trendmentor
comments.text: 同意，放大周期后结构比噪音更重要。
comments.zh: 同意，放大周期后结构比噪音更重要。

comments.text: 耐心=仓位管理，不是硬扛波动。
comments.zh: 耐心=仓位管理，不是硬扛波动。

posts.fullText:
$HOOD — Zooming out on a stock chart removes the noise and shows the bigger picture more clearly. Patience.

Short-term fluctuations can feel dramatic, but trend quality is usually easier to judge on higher timeframes.
posts.fullZh:
$HOOD：把图表周期拉长，噪音会明显减少，主趋势会更清楚。核心是耐心。

短期波动看起来很剧烈，但在更高周期里，趋势质量通常更容易判断。

posts.name: Leverage Shares ETFs
posts.text:
Supermicro vs AMD: The AI Revenue Shift

$SMCI beat and raised guidance, targeting $40B FY2026 revenue as AI server demand accelerates.

$AMD also beat, but flagged a more measured AI ramp.

AI spend is real, but revenue is crystallizing first at the infrastructure layer.
posts.zh: SMCI vs AMD：AI 收入兑现节奏出现分化。SMCI 上调指引并锚定 FY2026 收入 400 亿美元；AMD 同样超预期但强调 AI 放量更温和。结论：AI 资本开支真实存在，当前最先兑现的是基础设施层。

comments.name: semicap_watch
comments.text: 基础设施先兑现这条主线目前最清晰。
comments.zh: 基础设施先兑现这条主线目前最清晰。

comments.name: chipcycle
comments.text: AMD 更偏平台扩散期，节奏确实会慢半拍。
comments.zh: AMD 更偏平台扩散期，节奏确实会慢半拍。

posts.fullText:
Supermicro vs AMD: The AI Revenue Shift

$SMCI beat and raised guidance, targeting $40B FY2026 revenue as AI server demand accelerates.
$AMD also beat, but flagged a more measured AI ramp.

AI spend is real, but revenue is crystallizing first at the infrastructure layer.
posts.fullZh:
SMCI vs AMD：AI 收入兑现正在分层发生。

$SMCI 财报超预期并上调指引，FY2026 收入目标 400 亿美元，反映 AI 服务器需求加速。
$AMD 同样超预期，但对 AI 放量节奏表述更审慎。

结论：AI 开支真实存在，但收入最先在基础设施层落地。

posts.name: The Long Investor
posts.text:
$NVDA has dropped out of the rising wedge (bearish)

BUT

The 200 Day MA is still there, the last saviour for the market I believe at $169

Can the market hold on until $NVDA reports on the 25th of Feb?
posts.zh: 技术观点：NVDA 跌破上升楔形偏空，但 200 日均线（约 169 美元）仍是关键支撑。市场能否撑到 2 月 25 日财报前是观察重点。

comments.name: macrotrigger
comments.text: 25号前市场情绪大概率继续围绕 NVDA 摆动。
comments.zh: 25号前市场情绪大概率继续围绕 NVDA 摆动。

comments.text: 169 一旦失守，资金会重新定价风险区间。
comments.zh: 169 一旦失守，资金会重新定价风险区间。

posts.fullText:
$NVDA has dropped out of the rising wedge (bearish).

BUT the 200-day MA is still there — potentially the last major support around $169.

Can the market hold until NVDA reports on Feb 25? That's the key test for risk appetite.
posts.fullZh:
技术面观察：$NVDA 已跌破上升楔形，形态偏空。

但 200 日均线仍在（约 169 美元），这可能是当前最关键的中期支撑。

市场能否撑到 2 月 25 日 NVDA 财报前，是接下来风险偏好的核心检验点。

posts.name: Juan
posts.text:
Record daily volume for Kalshi during Super Bowl Sunday. If $HOOD captured 40% of it, that’s about $350M in volume, or $3.5M in revenue.

Not bad at all.
posts.zh:
超级碗周日 Kalshi 创下单日成交纪录。若 $HOOD 拿下其中 40%，大约对应 3.5 亿美元成交量、350 万美元收入。

相当不错。
